descriptions.description: A mix of Slayer and other Free For All games. Here, you must stand on your own.
A mix of Slayer and other Free For All games. Go it alone, or join as a group and skirmish.
Assorted Team Slayer games on varied maps. Work with your team to outkill your opponents.
A wide assortment non-Slayer objective games. Mix things up a bit, with a team or with an entire party.
One on one games on custimized versions of Halo 3's maps.
A mix of games for more than two teams. Like Free For All, but with a partner to work with.
Assorted games for teams of two. Work together or die alone, teamwork is critical here.
No shields, no sensors. Just you, your BR, and a lot of headshots.
